thread.section_title: Raffaello Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Great Value for Money
thread.title_full: Perfect Great Value for Money - Review of Raffaello Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Vincent C
title: Perfect Great Value for Money
text:
This place is wonderful for the price and only 10mins to the Coluseeim
/Forum and 15min to the Trevi Fountain. The hotel is old but rooms were modern. Breakfast was very nice. Service was excellent. No faults for the price. Close to Termini station (10min) hence easy to get to and from the airport. 10 stars.
